The problem I have with this insert is its focus on 'venting' and 
colour...sies... an idiot is an idiot despite his colour was it not the 
seeing of colour that got us into this mess...when will we learn? When 
Julius Malema is president? or when the poor decide enough is enough and 
civil war breaks out? when will we learn? ﻿

But that is my point Jimbo look how concise you can be when making valid 
points....I never said ' Blacks are violent, corrupt and incapable of 
running a country right?' You just said it. I repeat: Corruption has no 
colour and the ANC does not represent the entire black race. The ANC and 
the white supremacists do not have to 'like' each other for them to enjoy 
business as usual. The white supremacists do NOT have to do anything to 
ensure that black people are economically repaired after all the 
exploitation why should they if they are enjoying the fruits of 
exploitation?  Remember our constitution was drawn to protect 
white privilege. Which is what I have been saying all along. The resources 
are in white hands simply because the ANC did not want to take back the 
resources and lose foreign investors instead. They just want to be friends 
with the West because for them to nationalise would mean turning away 
foreign investors and we all know how the West feels about that. That is 
why our people are suffering and still trapped in a system meant to exploit 
them. You cannot change the leaders but keep the system. That is what Helen 
Zille is protecting in the Western Cape. The rights of white men to keep 
exploiting our resources and people. I blame the ANC because they have the 
power to change all that right now but everybody keeps zig zagging around 
the topic. South Africa is one of the most abundant countries in the world 
but the only people milking that abundance is the West. Did you know that 
80% of our resources are foreign invested. Let us not even begin to talk 
about the thousands of Europeans living in Cape Town (gainfully employed 
while South Africans struggle to work) because South Africa is all known as 
a tax haven while you and I would never enter Europe with those intentions 
(because we are liabilities and they are assets)....and people who just 
want to keep their privilege but shout ubuntu at every corner. The rainbow 
nation is a myth created by the West to token Nelson Mandela and throw 
shade over the real issues....

Yes that might be true that the old policemen might still be around 
but...after apartheid the 'new' constitution which was signed by members of 
the ANC changed how the police should operate. Which means it was 
unconstitutional of them to fire at the miners without first using other 
measures to disperse a crowd e.g teargas, rubber bullets. The current 
government (READ ANC ) are the ones who have the power to make sure they 
are bought to justice but they are not doing that because the mine bosses 
(read white men) have more money and they (READ ANC) are obviously 
benefitting from them. So they chose the rich whitemen over their own 
citizens...and YOU just want to hold the whitemen accountable?

you just proved you are an idiot...those policemen are hired by the ANC 
government and even today justice for those miners has not been reached 
because YOUR ANC loves white money than it does black men...the families of 
those miners are at a standstill and I know this because I have personally 
talked to them instead of spewing bullshit from your ARSE like I said 
before.GO OUT THERE AND MAKE A REAL DIFFERENCE. A big house is not a 
problem . A HOUSE THAT COSTS 245 MILLION RANDS IN A COUNTRY WHERE CHILDREN 
STARVE AND PEOPLE ARE UNEMPLOYED IS A PROBLEM. The mere fact that you do 
not 'get' that tells me a lot about YOU 'caring' for your people.You are 
the blind one. You have been brainwashed to believe the lies of men who 
only want what is best for themselves. The only way to fight white racism 
is by holding people who uphold it accountable despite their colour.so get 
over yourself and it takes a coon to know a coon...you idiot excusing a 
government that does not want to do anything to rectify the sins of the 
past...I keep repeating myself...and I am getting bored...I am going to 
start having debates with people who make sense not idiots who enlarge 
their cocks by commenting on youtube...I repeat get a life...get a job...As 
if my tribe, the way I look has anything to do with it...I know you 
probably fantasise about me bwahhahahahahahahaha...dont breed...the last 
one is the most important one.....NO REDEEMING FEATURES???? HOW DO YOU COME 
TO THAT WITHOUT HAVING MET ME....now leave me alone you useless excuse of a 
person and stop giving m you opinion I could care less...give me the black 
and white facts of your statements

You are an idiot Jimbo dear and you will forever be one. White racism 
bought us here but black compliancy  is keeping us here. Black people have 
become compliant within a system that was set to oppress them from the 
beginning. The ANC does not stand for the entire black race they stand 
evidently for themselves. So don't confuse the two. As I said earlier the 
'party of the people' that was meant to liberate has shackled us even more 
by buying into capitalism without thinking first of the needs of the 
citizens. The ANC has done little to redress and make reparations. Their 
reparation policies seem to only benefit a small elite. In order to move 
forward we have to stop justifying the wrongs that are still being done to 
black people. Accountability for the past needs to take place otherwise we 
are just fooling ourselves...Nkandla is a huge symbol that shows that the 
Zuma ANC just wants self enrichment. We should not excuse that just because 
they are black. Many parties claim to want what is 'best for the people' 
but many of them are ignorant to the fact that after apartheid nothing has 
been done to redress and repair the lives of those that are dispossessed. I 
have been reading this thread and I still do not get your point dude....you 
argue in zig zags without any substance please formulate and structure your 
sentences in an understandable manner instead of zig zagging through 
topics....
You are the cowardly piece of crap who just swears at people on youtube 
under an alias because it makes you feel better about your situation but 
will not discuss how the black man is continuing the disservice. You will 
not discuss how black men are leaving their women to fend for themselves 
while continuing to father children. Not everything that is skewed with the 
world is the white man's fault. I am a hard working black woman who raises 
a family on my own as my mother did and as my grandmother did. Because 
BLACK men of your kind are standing on the road hand out looking backwards 
at what THEY did to us instead of rectifying it. Instead of opening your 
ears to listen first your first reaction is a response. It is the black 
women who are holding the black community together my dear while you black 
men argue amongst yourselves and support governments that are clearly not 
doing anything to help rectify the sins of the past...So are you in 
actuality saying that Nkandla and the misuse of public funds to fund one 
family is the white mans fault. Are you saying that we should keep quiet 
when the government does not serve us because the white man has done worse? 
Because the ANC is a black party we should excuse their evils in 
compensation for the atrocities of apartheid? Wow and I am the deranged 
piece of crap? What is your solution baba? Because all you are doing is 
pointing fingers...What is your solution...oh I know...your solution is to 
swear on youtube videos and you think that does a lot to show black 
competency...dot your i's and cross your t's brother...just because I think 
what the ANC is doing is wrong does not mean that I hate black people or I 
am ignorant to white racism. I am also not ignorant to the fact that many 
black elites will use the poor mans struggle as a way to line their own 
pockets. It plainly means I have my eyes wide open and I see it all for 
what it is politricks in a democrazy...

Oh grow up will you...calling people pieces of garbage. Grow up and it 
takes one to know one or in this case not to know one because you do not 
know me. Anyway I am not in anyway trying to change your mind...it is clear 
YOU have been brainwashed i never said everything was the ANC s fault but 
you seem to think they have no hand in it so run along now blind 
follower...the ANC who are in power at the moment are doing 
NOTHING/NADA/BUPKINS to alleviate the plight of the black man. Instead they 
rely on foot soldiers like you to do the leg work and keep them in their 
seats. While you propagate that everything is the white man's fault they 
continue to plunder what is left of the pie. I do not like to communicate 
to the likes of you...You are the one who is instigating war by dividing 
the people who should in this time come together and mend what was broken. 
In order to do this we need to accept that atrocities happened in the past. 
We need to accept that there are people to blame for what happened and that 
even today as we stand  as a country there are people to blame. Make those 
people accountable. Then we can move forward. But pointing fingers in all 
directions of the wind is not going to help you much. Also remember that 20 
years into a democracy is quite immature. Most developed countries even 
within Africa have a democracy much longer than our and to get to that 
point they had to go through what we go through now. Germany when the wall 
came down was in tatters it took years to build. You my 'friend' are 
immature and you listen to weed banter. Like I advised you before read a 
book (oh you probably won't read it because it is propaganda from the white 
man). If you read my comment which started this thread of bullshit you will 
know that I was merely seeking a solution...I doubt you can understand 
things in context...and I quote myself 'AN IDIOT IS AN IDIOT DESPITE HIS 
COLOUR WAS IT NOT THE SEEING OF COLOUR THAT GOT US INTO THIS MESS...' now 
explain to me how that blames blacks? And a little bit off topic I find it 
interesting that you think the white man bought aids into africa whether 
its true or not one may never know but I can tell you one thing if that is 
truly the case then the black man heeded his plan very well...very good at 
spreading the disease around or was that also the white man who came to 
them in their dreams and infected all of them and their wives and killed 
millions? Sies you ought to be ashamed of yourself I bet you believe that 
virgins cure the disease too? you are one of those black brothers who won't 
take accountability for his own life and keeps pointing fingers while you 
father children all over the place with no notion to take care of them? 
that is also the white mans fault is it not? It is time especially black 
men to look within yourselves especially if you want to survive in this 
world. Look within your own people and see how you can better their lives. 
Yes we have gone through misfortunes, yes we should continue the fight for 
equality in all aspects of the word but that does not excuse us as a people 
of any crimes. Do you know the dis service many black men are doing to our 
people leaving women as single mothers and therefore stunting the growth of 
our communities...WAKE UP...YESTERDAY IS GONE AND TODAY IS HERE INSTEAD OF 
WRITING TOTAL UTTER BULLSHIT ON YOUTUBE GO AND CHANGE THE WORLD YOU LIVE 
IN...IT IS THE ONLY ONE YOU HAVE...

+Zonica Lombard On both sides of the coin there are people like him who 
will excuse anything in the name of preserving their 'culture' preserving 
their beliefs...which are usually hate based and no amount of reasoning can 
get to them...When I hear from and see people like you who understand 
reason then I breathe a sigh of relief because there is hope for our 
country after all... :-)

+Johan Benade I really think you are not one to tell me anything on grammar 
did you even read what you wrote? Good bey? (goodbye) really? Anyway it is 
not an afrikaans saying at all it is from the bible...and I guess u are 
that Jimbo dude back with a new account? I never insulted anyone for using 
bad grammar. I also never said anything vulgar to anyone who did not insult 
me first with that said I have nothing to prove to a stranger on 
youtube...and it is wrote not rote practice what you preach "Haal die stomp 
uit jou oë, voor jy die splinter uit ander will haal" Now go cry Red

+FreeVerse Wa ga Montsho
Hahaha, well said actually but, in the very post you rote to insult some

There is a saying in Afrikaans, "Haal die stomp uit jou oë, voor jy die 
splinter uit ander will haal", I deeply loath racist people for they are 
what this country's downfall is, that is why we are never going to evolve 
into a 1st world country. Now my advise to you is, press the windows button 
and switch off you computer and go back to finish grade 10. Good bey.

LOOOOL why did I entertain you thou? LOL I am a racist because I think the

Do you read? I said the insert focuses on the colour of the people buying

propagate during apartheid. The idea that black people are lazy which is 
not true because laziness is not something that can be equated to the

answers. You do not know me well enough to make assumptions about my 
character or 'people like me'. What contributions  (other than distorted 
youtube comments) are you making as a black person to the development of 
your race? I suggest you start by educating yourself first about the 
african continent before starting unwarranted rants on the internet and 
embarrassing your intellect...again I ask WHEN will we learn?

+Martin Nangombe 'To the Previously Disadvantaged'
We are sorry that our ancestors were intelligent, advanced and daring 
enough to explore the wild oceans to discover new countries and develop 
them.
We are sorry that those who came before us took you out of the bush and 
taught you that there was more to life than beating drums, killing each 
other and chasing animals with sticks and stones. We are sorry that they 
planned, funded and developed roads, towns, mines, factories, airports and 
harbours, all of which you now claim to be your long deprived inheritance 
giving you every right to change and rename these at your discretion.
We are sorry that our parents taught us the value of small but strong 
families, to not breed like rabbits and end up as underfed, diseased, 
illiterate shack dwellers living in poverty.
We are sorry that when the evil apartheid government provided
you with schools, you decided they'd look better without windows
or in piles of ashes.
We happily gave up those bad days of getting spanked in our all white 
Schools for doing something wrong, and much prefer these days of freedom 
where problems can be resolved with knives and guns.
We are sorry that it is hard to shake off the bitterness of the past when 
you keep on raping, torturing and killing our friends and family members, 
and then hide behind the fence of 'human rights' with smiles on your faces.
We are sorry that we do not trust the government... We have no reason to be 
so suspicious because none of these poor "hard working intellectuals" have 
ever been involved in any form of "corruption or irregularities".
We are sorry that we do not trust the police force and, even though they 
have openly admitted that they have lost the war against crime and 
criminals, we should not be negative and just ignore their corruption and 
carry on hoping for the best.
We are sorry that it is more important to you to have players of colour in 
our national teams than winning games and promoting patriotism.
We know that sponsorship doesn't depend on a team's success. We are sorry 
that our border posts have been flung open and now left you competing for 
jobs against illegal immigrants from our beautiful neighbouring countries.
All of them countries that have grown into economic powerhouses after 
kicking out the 'settlers'. We are sorry that we don't believe in 
witchcraft, beet root and garlic cures, urinating on street corners, 
virginity testing, slaughtering of bulls in our back yards, trading women 
for cattle and other barbaric practices.
Maybe we just grew up differently.
We are sorry that your medical care, water supplies, roads, railways and 
electricity supplies are going down the toilet because skilled people who 
could have planned for and resolved these issues had to be thrown away 
because they were of the wrong ethnic background and now have to work in 
foreign countries where their skills are highly appreciated.
We are so sorry that we'd like this country to fulfil its potential so we 
can once again be proud South Africans.

@Fitsum I'm a Afrikaans white South African and I agree that the content in 
the video is trash (you're welcome to call it white trash, but I would like 
to add to that the words sci-fi and conspiracy theorism). It may be true 
that said bunkers exist and it may be true that some prankster convinced 
the president the world would be destroyed by whatever world desaster. But 
there is no need to turn this into a racial matter. I don't subscribe to 
the "white guilt" going around (where white people kiss black people's 
butts because they feel guilty for something they themselves had nothing to 
do), neither do I subscribe to racism. I grew up in a racist environment, 
whites only school, but I soon learned that all humans were created in 
God's image. In the beginning God created only two people and out of them 
came all "races". Due to inbreeding, certain charactoristics remained with 
certain groups of people, no doubt people are different, but we are still 
part of the same race, the human race. People always tend to seek the 
difference between their group and another which they may not like. Men 
would say stuff like "woman drivers..." or Christians could say "its the 
Muslims", kids could say "parents...". Unfortunately one cannot deny the 
fact that groups of people, usually grouped by colour, are responsible for 
certain "bad things" that were done in the past and thing done today. 
Unfortunately many of those "bad things" are motivated by racism. If you 
REALLY want to know the truth behind politics, why noone has stopped 
Mugabe, why the world is in financial crisis's, why all wars are at its 
core about religion, why the world is full of illness, sick people, hatred, 
murder, all these "bad things", go do your own research. Did you know these 
things were predicted in the Bible, so acurately one cannot deny it? Did 
you know the Bible even states who would be in charge of the world in the 
last days? Do you even know who is currently the only person on earth that 
has authority over each and every government? Did you know anyone, no 
matter what you have done, can be saved and enjoy eternal life with no 
heartache nor illness? If you are tired of conspiracy theories based on 
weak sources and opinions, then I'd like to invite you to search Youtube 
for videos made by people such as Proff Walter Veith (an x-evolution 
professor at Stellenbosch university who is currently traveling the world 
teaching people what is really happening. Look for his Total Onslaught 
series), Mark Woodman, Ivor Meyers (my favorite! He sums up the Bible 
timeline in 26 minutes), Doug Batchelor (look for his Prophacy Code 
series). All these people, particularly Walter Veith, have real hard 
factual evedince which you can find yourselves. All their research is fully 
documented and you can go to the source and find the exact same 
information. (If Walter for example says the Pope said you shouldn't eat 
Bubblegum in public, he would give you a link to the Pope's website and you 
can find that document for yourselve.)

To end my post, it is true that the world is coming to an end. I think we 
all know that, whether you believe in Atheisism, Christianity, Islam, 
Hinduism. The real question is, are you ready for what is to come? Will you 
be safe? The Bible also predicts the world is to be destroyed and even your 
underground bunkers won't survive. But, there is also the promise that 
those who do what the Owner and Creator of this world demand, would receive 
the best gift anyone could ever ask for. So you're wondering how a God 
could let His creation be in such a state? That is a fair question, which 
the Satan and his fallen angels worked real hard to make real hard to 
understand. Its not a matter of God punishing His people, it is a matter of 
God allowing people to choose freely what they wish to. He is not a 
dictator, He wants you to love Him out of your own, not because you are 
programmed to do so. If you see a wooden chair outside a house and its been 
burned in the sun due to lack of care, would you accuse the creator of that 
chair of hating the chair or punishing it? No, you would simply say noone 
has taken care of it. If the chair was regularly oiled, or taken to its 
creator to be maintained, it wouldn't be "sick". The same with the world. 
Since more and more people chose not to accept God, God won't force anyone 
so He "pulls away" and the result is a sick world. Think about this, if 
every human on this earth kept all of the 10 Commandments, there wouldn't 
be any death, any hatred, any of those "bad things". People, the end is 
near, you need to find for yourself what is truth and what you should do to 
be safe and saved. Noone can do it for you, it is up to you to open your 
heart and mind to the truth.
